titleInfo.title: USA v. Azpeitia
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 13 motion to continue as to Antonio R. Azpeitia (1) - Change of Plea Hearing set for 7/31/2009 10:30 AM in Courtroom 5, Roman L. Hruska United States Courthouse, 111 South 18th Plaza, Omaha, NE, before Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. Additional time between July 9, 2009, and July 31, 2009, shall be deemed excludable under the requirement of the speedy trial act. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (JDR)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Azpeitia
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Antonio R. Azpeitia (1), Counts 1, 2,3 - Defendant pleaded guilty to counts I, II and III of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the UnitedStates Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of one hundred forty (140) months, to be served concurrently with the sentence imposed in 8:09CR04; the defendant shall be given credit for time served since June 4, 2009 ; supervised release with special conditions for a term of three (3) years, to be served concurrently with the term imposed in 8:09CR04; $200.00 special asssessment; Final order of forfeiture as to Count III forthcoming as to defendant Antonio R. Azpeitia. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (4 Certified copies to USM)(ADB, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to Antonio R. Azpeitia (1), Counts 1, 2,3 - Defendant pleaded guilty to counts I, II and III of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the UnitedStates Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of one hundred forty (140) months, to be served concurrently with the sentence imposed in 8:09CR04; the defendant shall be given credit for time served since June 4, 2009 ; supervised release with special conditions for a term of three (3) years, to be served concurrently with the term imposed in 8:09CR04; $200.00 special asssessment; Final order of forfeiture as to Count III forthcoming as to defendant Antonio R. Azpeitia. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (4 Certified copies to USM)(ADB, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Azpeitia
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER regarding Notice of Appeal to USCA29 as to defendant Antonio R. Azpeitia. The defendant is permitted to proceed on appeal in forma pauperis. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (Copy mailed to defendant.) (JAE, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER regarding Notice of Appeal to USCA29 as to defendant Antonio R. Azpeitia. The defendant is permitted to proceed on appeal in forma pauperis. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (Copy mailed to defendant.) (JAE, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Azpeitia
titleInfo.subTitle: STRICKEN - PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE sustaining 35 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture as to Antonio R. Azpeitia (1); Based upon Count III of the Indictment and the defendant's plea of guilty, the United States is hereby authorized to seize the Smith&Wesson, Model 10- 8,.38 caliber revolver, serial # 5D93525; Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture pursuant to 21 U.S.C. § 853(n), in which all interests will be addressed. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)( ADB, ) Modified on 1/20/2010 to strike per order 45(ADB, ).

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: STRICKEN - PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE sustaining 35 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture as to Antonio R. Azpeitia (1); Based upon Count III of the Indictment and the defendant's plea of guilty, the United States is hereby authorized to seize the Smith&Wesson, Model 10- 8,.38 caliber revolver, serial # 5D93525; Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture pursuant to 21 U.S.C. § 853(n), in which all interests will be addressed. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)( ADB, ) Modified on 1/20/2010 to strike per order 45(ADB, ).

titleInfo.title: USA v. Azpeitia
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER sustaining 44 Motion to Dismiss Count(s) as to Antonio R. Azpeitia (1); The Preliminary Order of Forfeiture (Filing No. 36) is stricken. Count III of the Indictment is dismissed and the forfeiture pertaining to this case is closed. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. ( ADB, )
